pages.text: Used to craft the $(l:amazons/items/amazon_injector_neo)Amazon$(/l) $(l:amazons/items/amazon_injector_new_omega)Injec$(/l)$(l:amazons/items/amazon_injector_neo_alpha)tors$(/l) and the $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_neo)Neo$(/l) $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_omega)Amazons$(/l) $(l:amazons/devices/neo_amazons_driver_neo_alpha)Drivers$(/l)
Obtained by using $(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vials$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/amazon_cell_mutator)Amazon Cell Mutator$(/l)
